actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection, and Competitiveness.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection, and Competitiveness

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Department of Commerce from certain activities which feature or convey the advantages of relocating United States businesses in a foreign country.

summary.text: Prohibits the Department of Commerce from providing financial or other assistance for conferences, trade shows, expositions, seminars, or publications which feature or convey advantages of relocating U.S. industries, manufacturing, assembly plants, or companies in a foreign country.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Department of Commerce from certain activities which feature or convey the advantages of relocating United States businesses in a foreign country.
